title: #135 - YouTube Ends Copyright Abuse
description: On this episode of the H3 Podcast we talk about how YouTube has finally taken action to end the rampant copyright abuse, but is also being sued for discrimination by a LGBTQ+ group, we talk about how Arby's is disgusting slop that you should never eat, we talk about if Fredo is an Italian slur, and we talk about the crown jewel of crazy scooter people videos which shall not be topped any time soon!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
itunes:subtitle: On this episode of the H3 Podcast we talk about how YouTube has finally taken action to end the rampant copyright abuse, but is also being sued for discrimination by a LGBTQ+ group, we talk about how Arby's is disgusting slop that you should never...
